EmailTemplate.name: Global_Event_Lean+Leaders_General_2017.Confirmation
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank you
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hi {{lead.First Name:default=there}},
Thank you for registering to win a Full-Day Leader’s Guide To Adopting Lean Startup at Scale Workshop!
If you win, you will receive notification of date and location details for your selected city by November 25, 2016.
If you have any questions or if you are interested in learning more about bringing The Leader’s Guide to your company, please contact us via leadersguide@pivotal.io <[[mailto:leadersguide@pivotal.io]]>.
We hope to see you soon!
The Pivotal Team
